name: Reflector Knight
description:
Game By Johnny Scott.

Music: Ghost.mp3 by Eggy Toast:

 https://freemusicarchive.org/music/eggy-toast/game-music/ghostmp3/

** I have added a new control scheme based on user feed back. See below for the mouse controls**

Instructions: 

Use your attack to knock the enemies on the ground up into the air and reflect them at the airborne enemies that appear above. 

(Ground enemies are harmless and do not attack you.)

Remember to dodge oncoming attacks!

Keyboard Controls:

WASD: Moves character Left and Right

Left Shift: Attack

Space: Reflects Enemies Upwards

Arrow Keys: Changes angle of enemy reflection

M: Toggles music

Mouse Controls: 

WASD: Moves character Left and Right

Left Click: Reflects Enemies Upwards

Space: Attack

Mouse Position: Changes angle of enemy reflection

M: Toggles music

For anyone who plays my game, thank you and I hope you enjoy it.
